text: I'm going to be late to standup but here are my updates: testing our transmission efficiency today to see how/where ota updates need hardening. Ota should be done by end of next week. Started working on cellar tracker scraping for machine learning testing with Oliver (got approval for working with Oliver too)
Great! Thanks <@U0K8ZSHN0>. We'll just do stand-up remotely. I'm essentially working on some resourcing stuff.

attachments.title: Motorized Precision – KIRA, an innovative new high-speed camera robot
attachments.text: Motorized Precision knows the value of intuitive and accessible technology. Making cinema robotics easier to use for cinematographers and directors.
attachments.fallback: Motorized Precision – KIRA, an innovative new high-speed camera robot
